select t.cdid menu_code,t.cdmc menu_name,t.s_cdid praentId,t.cdxh menuOrder,t.cdjc,t.cd_url menu_src,t.cdtb menu_icon,t.cdgs from spu_t_cd_new t left join spu_t_jscd_gl a on t.cdid = a.cdid left join spu_t_yhjs_gl b on a.jsid = b.jsid left join spu_t_yhxx c on c.yhid = b.yhid where t.yxbz='Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and c.yhzt ='0' and (t.cdjc = '1' or t.cdjc = '2' or t.cdjc = '3')
and c.yhid=#{yhid}
and a.yxq_q<=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and a.yxq_z>=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
order by praentId,t.cdxh
mapper.update: UPDATE spu_t_yhxx SET ip=#{ip} ,zhdlsj=Now() where yhid=#{yhid}
